name: innards-out

effect.sun_moon: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

short_effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
